name: Gold Combo Match
description:
Gold Combo Match is a fun and addictive match 3 puzzle game! Use your skills and imagination to clear the board and advance in your adventure.
Switch and match 3 identical jewels in a row to blast them. Match 4 jewels for cool effects and power-ups like bombs, lightings, additional time. Match 5 jewels in a line or in an L or T form to create special colorful bomb that can burst all jewels with the same color. Win some gold before you run out of time!

Features
- Nice music and soundFX
- Cool graphics
- Power gems
- Many different levels
- Smooth and easy gameplay

Eliminate the jewels quickly and you will get more combos and extra scores.
Improve your matching skills and have fun playing Gold Combo Match!
